product_info.title: ZD400 SERIES DESKTOP PRINTERS
product_info.description:
--- Page 1 ---
PRODUCT SPEC SHEET
ZD400 SERIES DESKTOP PRINTERS
ZD400 Series Desktop Printers
Elevate your expectations with advanced, compact printers, built for
enduring performance
You need a reliable printer that delivers quality performance, now and for years to come. It needs to offer key features, and be easy
to set up, operate, manage and maintain–onsite or remotely. It needs to be secure, whether it is integrated onto your network or
not, to prevent downtime and costly cyberattacks. You need it. Zebra delivers it, for more than 50 years. We design our printers to
match your workflows, ensuring they are hassle-free and ready to work. Day in and day out. We’re always innovating to deliver the
best to help you advance your business and be ready for what’s next.
Simple to Setup, Use and Manage Today
Ready to Evolve for Tomorrow
Featuring Zebra DNA™, the ZD400 Series is easy to integrate,
simple to operate and can be managed onsite or remotely via
a web-based dashboard. Designed to evolve with technology
and your business needs, the ZD400 Series features an
innovative architecture that powers future printing and
emerging applications, keeping your workflows at peak
performance.
Change Media Easily
Color-coded touch points and a new media-handling design
guide you through speedy media changes to keep printers
It’s Time to Advance operational and workers on task. Replace ribbon intuitively
and quickly with less mess, hassle and training time–and fewer
Powerful Printing with Intuitive Operation calls into IT.
Technology is constantly evolving, and so are your business
needs. ZD400 Series printers are ready to grow with you. Multiple Models to Match Your Needs
Incorporating a powerful new processor, you can run more
tasks and perform more operations simultaneously. Advanced Flexibility for Nearly Every Use Case
features and connectivity options, including field-upgradeable Available in direct thermal, thermal transfer, and healthcare
media handling and wireless kits, make them stand apart. Five models, the ZD400 meets a wide variety of application
LED icons that allow you to instantly see what’s needed to requirements. Both the 4-inch ZD421 and 2-inch ZD411 are
keep your printers up and running, from replenishing media available in two resolutions, offering numerous configurations
to resolving printer issues. The advanced three-button user and the ability to fit in virtually any workspace.
interface replaces the typical single-button/single-light
interface common in desktop printers.
Groundbreaking Cartridge for Instant Ribbon Changes
The ZD421 is the only thermal printer to offer a ribbon
cartridge that takes just a few seconds to load with fool-proof,
one-way, first-time and every-time instant loading. The smart
chip in the ribbon lets you know when the ribbon needs
replacing.
The ZD400 Series—Easy to operate. Flexible features. Ready for tomorrow.
For more information, please visit www.zebra.com/zd400
--- Page 2 ---
Smart Design for Smarter Operations Update, Troubleshoot and Monitor, All from a Single
Location
Backwards Compatible with Virtually any Existing Printer With Zebra’s Printer Profile Manager Enterprise, part of Zebra
DNA, you can easily manage, secure and troubleshoot your
Integrate your ZD400 Series printers into your existing printer
networked printers from one remote location anywhere in the
fleet seamlessly. Continue to use the same label formats and
world.
applications you’re using today. These printers support EPL
and ZPL printer languages and can emulate other languages
Unmatched Printing Security
associated with other printer brands using Zebra’s Printer
Emulations. Get unparalleled peace-of-mind and protect printers from
cyberattacks with Zebra’s PrintSecure, part of Zebra DNA.
Communication to Connect Your Way Easily configure your printers with secure connections, identify
vulnerabilities, block unauthorized access and more.
ZD400 Series printers can connect to your existing wired and
wireless networks, or directly to any PC. Every ZD411 and
Explore Managed Print Services (MPS)
ZD421 comes standard with USB and USB Host, and offers
optional Ethernet, Serial and dual wireless radio with fast with Assurance
Wi-Fi™ and Bluetooth®. Take advantage of your Wi-Fi 6/6E
network with the 802.11ax/Bluetooth 5.3 dual radio option or
Zebra’s Thermal Printers with Zebra DNA Make MPS Easy
choose 802.11ac/Bluetooth 4.2 dual radio. Print from any
Looking to gain control and visibility of your printer fleets with
Windows®, Android™ or iOS® device. Set up your ZD400
MPS? With Zebra DNA tools and applications for printers, your
Series printer easily with Zebra’s printer setup mobile app
Zebra MPS provider can remotely manage and optimize your
using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE). The included Print Touch
printers, track and automate supplies replenishment and
tag (NFC) allows you to simply tap to pair and print.
ensure security.
Advanced Flexibility and Features
Supplies, Services and Support
Moveable Sensor Means More Flexibility
Zebra Certified Supplies
The ZD400’s moveable media sensor allows for almost any
Printing supplies provide a digital voice for assets across your
media use, which means greater flexibility across a variety of
supply chain. You rely on them to disseminate critical data
applications.
throughout your organization. If something goes wrong with
your printing supplies, operations are interrupted, productivity
A Portable Solution to Print Almost Anywhere
suffers and costs rise. That’s why we design, produce and
Bring the ZD400 Series desktop printers to the point of
rigorously pretest our own line of labels, tags and receipt
application with Zebra’s optional battery and carrying case¹.
paper to ensure consistent, optimized performance in your
Print on the spot and increase accuracy and productivity.
Zebra printer. For industry-leading quality, service and
Power through a full shift with the high-capacity battery.
expertise, choose Zebra Certified Supplies.
Zebra DNA for Printers
Backed by Zebra’s Worldwide Service and Support
Access repair support services anywhere around the globe
Confident and Secure Printing are Yours through Zebra and its trusted network of more than 10,000
Powered by our Link-OS™ operating system, the Zebra DNA partners. Zebra OneCare™ Maintenance Plans provide
suite of software tools gets your printer up and running enhanced coverage that exceeds standard warranty.
quickly and securely. Print consistently and without
interruption with a solution that’s fully integrated and
interoperable, and ready to evolve with your business needs.
